DOC.brief_summary: To survey grade gastric MALT lymphoma eradication Helicobacter pylorus
DOC.brief_title: Prognostic Study Gastric MALT Lymphoma After Eradication Helicobacter Pylori
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : gastric lowgrade mucosaassociated lymphoid tissue ( MALT ) lymphoma Helicobacter pylori positive The stage MALT lymphoma Lugano International Conference classification Stage I II 1 Wotherspoon grade 4 5 Exclusion criterion : With diffuse large Bcell lymphoma Have treat gastric mucosaassociated lymphoid tissue ( MALT ) lymphoma Corresponding contraindication drug
